Package seng.monsters.model

Class Shop

java.lang.Object
seng.monsters.model.Shop
public final class Shop extends Object
A shop where you can buy or sell purchasable

  • Nested Class Summary

    static final class 
    Shop.InsufficientFundsException
    Signals that the buyer does not have sufficient fund to make the purchase
    static final class 
    Shop.NotInStockException
    Signals that the desired purchasable is not available in the Shop at this current state

    • buyPurchasable

      public void buyPurchasable(Purchasable purchasable) throws Shop.NotInStockException, Shop.InsufficientFundsException
      Buy a purchasable from the shop
      Parameters:
      purchasable - The purchasable trying to be bought
      Throws:
      Shop.NotInStockException - If the item is not available
      Shop.InsufficientFundsException - If the buyer does not have enough gold
